          <title>
            <string language="de">Vulkane - erloschen oder aktiv</string>
            <string language="en">Volcanos - extinct and active</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Volcans - éteints et actifs</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Vulcões - extinct e ativos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Vulcani - estinti ed attivi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Volcanos - εκλείψας και ενεργό</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Volcanes - extintos y activos</string>
          </title>
          <language>de</language>
          <description>
            <string language="de">Karte der USA, in der die Nationalparks als grüne Farbflächen eingezeichnet. Benannt sind die Nationalparks, in denen erloschene oder aktive Vulkane zu sehen sind.</string>
            <string language="en">Map of the U.S.A. showing the National Parks as green highlighted areas. National Parks with extict or active volcanos are labelled.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Amerika</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="de">Nordamerika</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">North America</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">USA</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">National park</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Nature</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Seeing worthyness</string>
          </keyword>

          </structure>
          <aggregationLevel>

            <value>1</value>
          </aggregationLevel>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Carte des Etats-Unis montrant les parcs nationaux
en tant que zones mises en valeur vertes. Des parcs nationaux 
avec l'extict ou les volcans actifs sont étiquetés.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Mapa dos EUA que mostram os parques nacionais 
como áreas destacadas verdes. Os parques nacionais com extict 
ou os vulcões ativos são etiquetados.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Programma degli S.U.A. che mostrano i parchi 
nazionali come zone evidenziate verdi. I parchi nazionali con 
extict o i vulcani attivi sono identificati.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χάρτης των ΗΠΑ που εμφανίζουν εθνικά πάρκα ως 
πράσινες τονισμένες περιοχές. Τα εθνικά πάρκα με το 
extict ή τα ενεργά volcanos ονομάζονται.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Correspondencia de los E.E.U.U. que muestran los 
parques nacionales como áreas destacadas verdes. Los parques 
nacionales con el extict o los volcanes activos se etiquetan.</string>
          </description>
